channel.title: What to do Now
channel.description:
Well I started to play runescape again after probably after 6 months. Well I got membership and did pest control and castle and other things like that. I got my hunter all the way to 68. I am currently trying to Full Dharak. Then after I buy it and then I will train on experiments to get my attack to 70, strength to 70, and the hardest, defense to 61. Well now I want to know what you guys think I should do. I am going to have about 4 days to hunt red chins so that I can get Full Dharak. If I can get a whip but i just want Full Dharak. Can you guys tell me if I am doing this right.
[center][size=18pt]Goals[/size][/center]
[ul][li]Get Full Dharak[/li][/ul] Solution- Hunt Red Chins about 3.6k of them
[ul][li]Get Stats to wear Full Dharak[/li][/ul] Solution- Kill Experiments
[ul][li]Get Whip[/li][/ul] Hunt Red Chins about 2.3k of them
[ul][li]Play God Wars Dungeon with items that I don't mind losing.(I don't want to lose all the stuff I work so hard for)[/li][/ul] Solution-??????????????????????????????
[ul][li]Then I Don't know what I want to do[/li][/ul] Solution- Give me suggestion
[size=16pt]If you could give me suggestions to make these goals go by faster, easier, and if applies not costing too much money.Also tell me what to do after I do this. And Tell me what I can do to make money faster and Stats I should get up.Need Big help with the Stats to 70. Defense!!!![/size]
My Account [img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/5581/123jy3.jpg[/img]

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @gsheni Dsheni
item.description:
@gsheni wrote:

Thanks pkapk and taharok. Just to let you know I have a 5 day break which means 5 days of runescape so I am ready to work my ass off. pk4pk pm me your email.

Edit I was wondering if runecrafting nature runes would be faster with the abyss

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Ok 1k D bones is 1.5-2mil and 1k Green dhides is 1.5mil I’m asuming as dbones sell 1.8-2k each and green hides 1.5-1.7k

So think of it this way. If you get 1k Dbones and green hides you should have more than what you need in 400 trips or so

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Do the math. If you can make 40k every 20 minutes, and assuming you will stay consistent, that means it will take you about 1300 minutes, which is around 21.7 hours. If you play ten hours a day (assuming you do), it would take you less than three days to get full dharok and an abyssal whip. By the way, don’t ask for suggestions unless you are FULLY ready to actually do them. I personally despise all runescapers who complain about getting off their ass to work. If you want dharok and a whip, you will have to work hard until you get it.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @gsheni Dsheni
item.description:
@gsheni wrote:

Well how fast will I Get my Full Dharak if I use your way and is there a lot of people there. Like how long would it take to get 2.6mil or so.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“gsheni, post:3, topic:189323”]Well is my Range good enough for them and what do you mean bandits. How fast will I get full dharak and my whip.[/quote]Ive seen people with 50 range before. All you need is full blue dhide a rune c’bow some mith bolts and go kill. Bandits are at bandit camp they are like levels 15-25 and if you want quick and easy exp there about 150 a kill and each kill with a d scim and your levles should be 10seconds

Oh and that prayer…it just bothers me get it to 43 with like 25dragon bones at an altar

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:2, topic:189323”]Well for the training,

Attack just kill experiments
Strength experiments (just get 70/70/70)
For defence I’d do rock crabs till 65 to get hitting a little better then bandits as they are easy to 70

For money sell those zammy legs if you dont need em and maybe the baxe. Then get 1k mith bolts and go kill green drags with full blue dhide on. If you get 12 bones and G hides thats 40k a trip and each trip should be 15-20min[/quote]

gsheni:

You guys going to give me a suggestion that I can actually do. If not then don’t post.

thats a good suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do Now
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Well for the training,

Attack just kill experiments
Strength experiments (just get 70/70/70)
For defence I’d do rock crabs till 65 to get hitting a little better then bandits as they are easy to 70

For money sell those zammy legs if you dont need em and maybe the baxe. Then get 1k mith bolts and go kill green drags with full blue dhide on. If you get 12 bones and G hides thats 40k a trip and each trip should be 15-20min

Read full topic
